channel.title: Server - Having Problems
channel.description:
Okay well, Ive decided to make a server based of the 'Project Czar' (my first server). I think Ive done every step correct in this tutorial to make a server: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,200036.0.html
So after following those steps (ive done rest apart from JDK), I stumbled into JDK and I downloaded it. When I download and then open the runserver.bat or compile.bat etc It still says I do not have JDK installed any help guys?

item.title: Server - Having Problems
item.dc:creator: @jarrodz jarrodz
item.description:
@jarrodz wrote:

Yes I installed it, but when I try to open the runserver.bat it says that i need to install the program, i read on the tutorial about reconizing JDK and im using a different version of the one that it says on it.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 02, 2008, 08:18:26 PM[/size][hr]Looks like this is one of the most difficult things for most people when setting up a server

Read full topic
